reviewText:
The U.S.A. championship is great. If I have the time, I can see the DVD each day.
So wonderful girls ...
This is a decent product.  The women are beautiful and it makes for an enjoyable veiwing experience.  However, it's just not the same as being there live.

I've been to strip clubs a lot, and this video just doesn't do much for me. The girls on here are very pretty, yet most of them don't display a lot of creativity in their acts. They can dance well enough, but with few exceptions their overall acts are relatively bland and unerotic. I was especially surprised that most of the girls strip immediately without any buildup of suspense. It's as though the contest was very rushed, so you're left feeling like you've seen just short clips of strip-tease acts. Now, a video of good-looking women dancing nude can't be all bad, but it can be done a lot better than this. Also, I'm not sure why this sometimes is said to be a 2-DVD set, but mine had only one in it. My favorite strip-tease videos are Premium Cuts: Sinsational Strippers,Sinsational Strippers 2,Hot Sexy Strippers: Trilogy, and Playboy TV - America's Hottest Strip Clubs, which are done with a lot more finesse and variety.

I got this dvd a few months ago.  It was purchased used and I only got the main dvd for some strange reason.  At any rate, the main dvd is good, but not great.  Only one dancer was interesting in her routine and displayed a wonderful stripping style with angel wings attached to her back.  The other perfomers just didn't display any creativity in dance style or with any props.  And, there wasn't a lot of creativity from the dancers with the pole work.  The dancers and the routines are good, but overall lack spark.  I would recommend "Sinsational Strippers" if you're looking for more creativity and variety.

This is a very good DVD for the money.  It contains 2 DVDs, both of which have addtional footage on the bottom side.  Starting with the bad points, the DVD titled "Wild Pairs" isn't that great.  It features only 4 girls (if I remember correctly), looks like it was shot with a home movie camera, and contains slow scenes that take way too long, don't reveal enough, & don't really feature any hot dancing.  For example, the first scene involves 2 girls, dressed in cowgirl outfits outside, playing "draw" using cards in their holsters instead of guns for strip poker.  Not a bad idea, but it took forever to even get their shirts off (lots of layers of clothing, with each round taking a very long time to get to the point), there was no theme variation (girls took turns winning each time), & no other action (girls finally got nude, then it was over).  Most of the additions on this DVD follow a similar pattern.

The main DVD, "Stripper U.S.A. Championship," was a lot better.  Lots of girls, all pretty, all with very sexy stripper routines, all get totally nude quickly & really shake "the goods."  Lots of close-up action (showing front & back holes) which surprised me.  One of the bonus features had an awesome lap dance competition, which was surprisingly explicit.  Only bad points were that it didn't have more than 1 girl at a time (this is why it didn't get 5 stars from me), too many blondes (could have been more diverse), & too many of the girls had "intimate area" piercings (suppose some guys like this).

Both DVDs had a lot of time on them - definitely a great deal at a cheap price.
